title: Accidental Heiress
description: Fun, young adult, contemporary romance with a happily ever after...  Nathaniel Rawlings never loses. Maddie Hart always comes in second. When their paths cross, it happens… Maddie’s luck holds true. She ruins his plans. What’s the big deal? Plans fail. Only this time it is a big deal. Rawlings has put up a priceless family heirloom as a scavenger hunt prize. He risked it because he knew, absolutely positively, that he would win. That was before he met Maddie. Partnered together, they’ll race across Europe, dodge betrayal, and ultimately learn the true meaning of priceless.
author: Emily  Evans
